# userInfo

**Instance Property**

Custom attributes that you can associate with the scene.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var userInfo: [String : Any]? { get set }
```

## Getting additional session information

- **stateRestorationActivity**: An activity object you can use to restore the previous contents of your scene’s interface.
